text: The Ural Front () is a 1944 Soviet war movie directed by Sergey Gerasimov.Большая земляБОЛЬШАЯ ЗЕМЛЯ It stars Tamara Makarova, Viktor Dobrovolsky, and Sofya Khalyutina. ==Actors== * Tamara Makarova as Anna Sviridova * Viktor Dobrovolsky as Anikeyev * Sofya Khalyutina as Maria Gavrilovna * Vladimir Solovyov as Yegor Sviridov * Sergei Blinnikov as Prikhodko * Georgi Kovrov as Chernykh == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1944 war movies Category:Soviet war movies Category:Movies directed by Sergei Gerasimov
title: The Ural Front
